name: MULTIPLAYER OBBY
description:
MULTIPLAYER OBBY - A Fun Obstacle Course Race Party Game. Make your way across moving platforms, jump pads, rotating beams and bridges that suddenly open, and More.
The first player to pick up the trophy is the winner!

The game includes a Single Player OR Multiplayer system.
Compatible with Steam online subsystem.
You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Icon on the Main Lobby Screen!
Tested online with clients under server-load.
* NOTE : You should have a Stable & Fast Internet Connection for Best Results *

It features all the necessary content needed to provide the Player with the best user and gameplay experience, such as a unique 3D environment, GUI design, and fun gameplay mechanics.

The Game is packed with action and many more features listed below . . .
Fun Gameplay
Main menu
Checkpoint respawn system
Names above player heads (when within certain distance of each other)
Chat Function in the Game Lobby
In-game Pause Menu (Continue, Leave game, Settings, Quit game)
Settings menu (Window mode, Resolution, Graphics quality, Audio Volume)

This is a fun social multiplayer game in which you can play the obstacle course together with your friends, or also Single Player.

The obstacle course is challenging, satisfying, colorful, and fun to play.
Make your way across challenging obstacles and be the first to reach the finish.
The game includes checkpoints where you can respawn in case you fall or die.

Challenge Yourself OR Invite Your Steam Friends for a Party Game.
